description:
Woah everything's different!!
A clean-room reimagining
of every card by Trollbreeder
(with strange balancing, i'm sorry
it's gonna be like that)

cards.name: Starvation
cards.description: Ported from Act 1. Act 2 sprite by syntaxevasion.

cards.name: Greater Smoke
cards.description: Ported from Act 1. Act 2 sprite by syntaxevasion.

cards.name: Adder
cards.description: Instant explosion, just add Dire Wolf!

cards.name: Bat
cards.description: Vampiric!

cards.name: Beaver
cards.description: Dams are attack conduits.

cards.name: Dam
cards.description: Bloody, bony attack conduit

cards.name: Bee
cards.description: Bee jumpscare!

cards.name: Beehive
cards.description: Hit me and get a free bee! Recyclable

cards.name: Black Goat
cards.description: Mmm, full of bones.

cards.name: Bloodhound
cards.description: All who wrong you will be destroyed.

cards.name: Bullfrog
cards.description: Bonehound if bonehound was actually a skeleton

cards.name: Cat
cards.description: Child 13 but weirder

cards.name: Undead Cat
cards.description: The product of killing a cat

cards.name: Cockroach
cards.description: Free chump blocker!

cards.name: Corpse Maggots
cards.description: Gives you more time and blood to counter an attack.

cards.name: The Daus
cards.description: Who sent all these *babies* to fight me?

cards.name: Chime
cards.description: Baby daus

cards.name: Dire Wolf Pup
cards.description: The pup needs a parental figure to show how it's done.

cards.name: Dire Wolf
cards.description: Fight me and my pups. See how you like it.

cards.name: Elk
cards.description: Moving into view activates sentry

cards.name: Elk Fawn
cards.description: 49er swap

cards.name: Field Mice
cards.description: Screw this hand.

cards.name: Spore Mice
cards.description: Keep screwing this hand.

cards.name: Hawk
cards.description: VERY territorial

cards.name: Hrokkall
cards.description: Shy but deadly with the right encouragement.

cards.name: Rat King
cards.description: Walkers + Dire Wolf

cards.name: Raven Egg
cards.description: Damage tanker

cards.name: Kingfisher
cards.description: Mine! Mine! Mine!

cards.name: Great Kraken
cards.description: Oh boy.

cards.name: Long Elk
cards.description: I'm useless but my vertebrae sure aren't

cards.name: Vertebrae
cards.description: Sharp spine of Long Elk!

cards.name: Alpha
cards.description: like a Dam but more blood costy and can self defense

cards.name: Magpie
cards.description: New Super Vessel Printer U Deluxe

cards.name: Mantis
cards.description: Mantis Jimmy

cards.name: Mantis God
cards.description: Jimmy ate too much plasma

cards.name: God
cards.description: Mantis Jimmy 2

cards.name: Mole
cards.description: Very cheap automatic chump blocker

cards.name: Mole Man
cards.description: Better automatic chump blocker

cards.name: Moose Buck
cards.description: Rampager that can easily be stopped

cards.name: Opossum
cards.description: I'm not a bad card! I'm not a misplay! Noooo!

cards.name: Ouroboros
cards.description: Ourobones

cards.name: Rabbit
cards.description: Run! Run rabbit run!

cards.name: Skunk
cards.description: Shuts down its lane.

cards.name: Coyote
cards.description: Gravedigger with some self defense

cards.name: Great White
cards.description: Super Beaver

cards.name: Grizzly
cards.description: Quick and dirty damage... once.

cards.name: Porcupine
cards.description: Oof ouch my hide

cards.name: Pronghorn
cards.description: This mirror keeps mirroring as long as it can.

cards.name: Rattler
cards.description: Ported from Act 1. Act 2 sprite by syntaxevasion. Explodebot util without the explosions.

cards.name: Raven
cards.description: BIG damage tanker

cards.name: Raven 1
cards.description: BIG damage tanker

cards.name: Raven 2
cards.description: BIG damage tanker

cards.name: Salmon
cards.description: It keeps panicking, despite magic letting it live.

cards.name: River Snapper
cards.description: Ported from Act 1. Act 2 sprite by syntaxevasion. Protective magic mantis.

cards.name: Sparrow
cards.description: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a sparrow should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The sparrow, of course, flies anyway because birds don't care what humans think is impossible.

cards.name: Sparrow 1
cards.description: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a sparrow should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The sparrow, of course, flies anyway because birds don't care what humans think is impossible.

cards.name: Sparrow 2
cards.description: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a sparrow should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The sparrow, of course, flies anyway because birds don't care what humans think is impossible.

cards.name: Strange Larva
cards.description: this is based on that Matryoshkabot idea i had

cards.name: Strange Pupa
cards.description: this is based on that Matryoshkabot idea i had

cards.name: Mothman
cards.description: this is based on that Matryoshkabot idea i had

cards.name: Bell Tentacle
cards.description: For whom the bells toll... enjoy Daus infestation.

cards.name: Hand Tentacle
cards.description: Blue mage.

cards.name: Mirror Tentacle
cards.description: Magpie.

cards.name: Squirrel Ball
cards.description: Catch me if you can!

cards.name: Stoat
cards.description: Total misplay.

cards.name: Urayuli
cards.description: FLYING URAYULI!!!

cards.name: Warren
cards.description: The rabbits within have all died already. Something else is inside...

cards.name: Wolf
cards.description: The wolf, a keeper of magic.

cards.name: Wolf Cub
cards.description: The wolf's apprentice.

cards.name: Fox
cards.description: The fox comes at the least opportune time, but you may come to appreciate it.

cards.name: Worker Ant
cards.description: A simple ant looking to benefit from the queen's grace and the electric grid.

cards.name: Ant Queen
cards.description: The queen is happy to produce energy for us, as long as we keep the ants going.

cards.name: Flying Ant
cards.description: Flying ants provide the ants with firepower and supplies from afar.

cards.name: Bullet Ant
cards.description: Awaiting sniper sigil implementation. This ant is out of commision

cards.name: Mole Seaman
cards.description: Yarr! Me crew be the finest on all seas, and me Ship the fastest to sail ever yet.

cards.name: Curve Hopper
cards.description: Fast fast fast!! Hop around the curve!!

cards.name: Automaton
cards.description: The automatons around the facility are so easy to assemble, we have another one down the line 2 minutes after you break one.

cards.name: Energy Bot
cards.description: A reproducible model, but we only have the parts for just one...

cards.name: Bolthound
cards.description: I MUST FEED ON THE SUSTENANCE OF BONES.

cards.name: Buff Conduit
cards.description: The powerlines are fighting back!!

cards.name: Busted 3D Printer
cards.description: Must print more. Must attack more. Error.

cards.name: Double Gunner
cards.description: Double down.

cards.name: Energy Conduit
cards.description: It's connected to the mains.

cards.name: Explode Bot
cards.description: It always comes back to explode some more.

cards.name: Factory Conduit
cards.description: L33pbots are powerful mantis conduits basically

cards.name: Gamblobot
cards.description: Gamble on your future, discard your hand today!

cards.name: GR1ZZ
cards.description: Discount swapbot

cards.name: GR1ZZ (beast)
cards.description: Discount swapbot

cards.name: Insectodrone
cards.description: Insectodrones sustain on mox from crystals, which they make into what's essentially monster energy drink gatorade lemonade chocolate honey. With artifictial peanut flavor.

cards.name: Junkbot
cards.description: Slap-dash contraption of random parts. Somehow it works.

cards.name: L33pB0t
cards.description: We are legion. We are l33pbotkind.

cards.name: M3atB0t
cards.description: More like bonebot, am i right?

cards.name: 49er
cards.description: Elk swap

cards.name: No Moon
cards.description: Can you even make this card work? I'd be proud of you if you did.

cards.name: Null Conduit
cards.description: Makes for a good wall, but you have better conduits elsewhere.

cards.name: Plasma Jimmy
cards.description: Pull back and let go! See the amazing results!

cards.name: Rustbucket
cards.description: It barely works. Parts are already snapping in half.

cards.name: Scrap Golem
cards.description: Reanimated from mechanical parts, not clay as is traditionally prescribed by Magnificus.

cards.name: Steel Mice
cards.description: Click and buy!! Buy now! Click on our advertising!! Buy NOW dont miss this!

cards.name: Sentry Drone
cards.description: Get off the premises.

cards.name: Sentry Spore
cards.description: No loitering... not at all!

cards.name: QU177
cards.description: Untrue to appearance, it is actually a genius and a scholar in energy magicks.

cards.name: QU177 (beast)
cards.description: Untrue to appearance, it is actually a genius and a scholar in energy magicks.

cards.name: SON1A
cards.description: Powercreep.

cards.name: SON1A (beast)
cards.description: Powercreep god.

cards.name: Mrs. Bomb
cards.description: Splits into two explodebots. Stop giggling.

cards.name: Shutterbug
cards.description: That's going in my cringe collection.

cards.name: Sniper Bot
cards.description: Broken sigils. Sorry.

cards.name: Steambot
cards.description: The ultimate wall.

cards.name: Mox Module
cards.description: It needs a kick to get going, but then it's all-right forever.

cards.name: Mirror Bot
cards.description: Who is that?

cards.name: Thick Droid
cards.description: Provides green and orange mox in one big package.

cards.name: Jukebot
cards.description: Inspiring tunes for your robot army. If only you had enough electricity to power it though.

cards.name: Draugr
cards.description: There's a skeleton inside... just like in YOU!!

cards.name: Banshee
cards.description: AAAAAAAAAAA

cards.name: Bonehound
cards.description: If bonehound was actually a skeleton

cards.name: Bone Lord's Horn
cards.description: Mysterious magicks flicker about as sparks while it produces more undead material.

cards.name: Bone Heap
cards.description: Poor thing.

cards.name: Broken Obol 1
cards.description: This obol has cut wiring inside...

cards.name: Broken Obol 2
cards.description: That obol has cut wiring inside...

cards.name: Dead Hand
cards.description: Get out of bad situation free card

cards.name: Pharaoh's Pets
cards.description: They can't get enough of sacrifice. They will do anything for the Pharaoh.

cards.name: Drowned Soul
cards.description: There were many of us. Hear our gargles. Hear our struggles.

cards.name: The Walkers
cards.description: None of them are used to fighting. They need encouragement.

cards.name: Frank & Stein
cards.description: "Two into one! Two into one!" the mycologists cried in unison. The experiment was a success. It was...

cards.name: Frank
cards.description: I shall kill as I desire.

cards.name: Stein
cards.description: I shall help out as I desire.

cards.name: Ghost Ship
cards.description: HEAR YE HEAR YE! We're going 6 feet under soon! Visit Davy Jones' before our skulls dry up on shore!

cards.name: Gravedigger
cards.description: Dig your own grave.

cards.name: Sporedigger
cards.description: Dig your own super special grave.

cards.name: Headless Horseman
cards.description: He had a head after all.

cards.name: Mummy Lord
cards.description: HOLY %@?%! THAT'S WHAT A MUMMY LORD LOOKS LIKE?!

cards.name: Necromancer
cards.description: I shall raise the dead as spooky skeletons! And no one will stop me!!

cards.name: Revenant
cards.description: Atleast this one doesn't have missile launchers.

cards.name: Sarcophagus
cards.description: There's nothing inside.

cards.name: Skeleton
cards.description: Very spoopy.

cards.name: Skelemagus
cards.description: And what do you know about spells? I'm a 400-year-old sorcerer!

cards.name: Tomb Robber
cards.description: They always shunt me off to the B-list. I'll never be as cool as the Tomb Raider.

cards.name: Zombie
cards.description: Central processor units! That doesn't roll off the tongue as well as braaaains...

cards.name: Floating Eye
cards.description: I see ya mate. I see ya!!

cards.name: Gargoyle
cards.description: hee hee. i love making you suffer for ridiculously long amounts of time

cards.name: Skeleton Crew
cards.description: Yar har har! Yo ho ho!

cards.name: Zombie Parrot
cards.description: SKREEET! YAR HAR! YO HO!

cards.name: Gourmage
cards.description: Mmm. Tasty. I love the smell of iron in the morning.

cards.name: Blue Mage
cards.description: Protector of all. Protector of our source.

cards.name: Blue Sporemage
cards.description: Too protective...

cards.name: Hover Mage
cards.description: This mage likes hovering just as much as they like ants. Ants are so cool! Have you seen their eusocial structure? I once... blablabla... blabla...

cards.name: Force Mage
cards.description: Knock off, mate! I'm ov here workin 24 and you just sit there doing WHAT exactly. Giddoot, giddey go!

cards.name: Gem Detonator
cards.description: Sorry, I meant a gem that detonates. Not one who detonates gems.

cards.name: Gem Fiend
cards.description: I like gems just as much as the next mage, but man, I... really like gems.

cards.name: Gem Guardian
cards.description: They shall escape from certain doom, I'll be sure of it!

cards.name: Green Mage
cards.description: Eey, i've goddy some side hustle here. Not liter, c'mon. Camonere. Wansome... bones??

cards.name: Junior Sage
cards.description: I may make some mistakes, but 'tis part of learning. I'm certain of it.

cards.name: Mage Knight
cards.description: DIE FOR OUR MAGICKS! DIE FOR OUR KING! I SHALL TAKE YOU WITH!

cards.name: Master Bleene
cards.description: I am one with power.

cards.name: Master Goranj
cards.description: I am one with cards.

cards.name: Master Orlu
cards.description: I am one with death.

cards.name: Emerald Mox
cards.description: Mox skeleton

cards.name: Ruby Mox
cards.description: Mox skeleton

cards.name: Sapphire Mox
cards.description: Mox skeleton

cards.name: Magnus Mox
cards.description: Mox skeleton

cards.name: Muscle Mage
cards.description: KAPOW!

cards.name: Orange Mage
cards.description: I am knowledged in great strengths. It might seem boring, but boring is practical.

cards.name: Practice Wizard
cards.description: Suddenly, its cogs and gears whir to life!

cards.name: Mage Pupil
cards.description: The sorcerer's apprentice... is it not a great position? You learn so much of the world and its workings...

cards.name: Ruby Golem
cards.description: I am the will of the crystal in orange.

cards.name: Stim Mage
cards.description: STIMULATION! HA HA HA!! YES!! AHAHA! I APPRECIATE EVERY MOX YOU PLAY!!! MORE STRONG!!

cards.name: Mox Tower
cards.description: The heavens will be orange!

cards.name: Mox Bunker
cards.description: The water deep beneath will be blue!

cards.name: Mox Encampment
cards.description: The grass under our feet will be green!

cards.name: Thief Mage
cards.description: OOH! SHINY STUFF FROM CORPSE! Mine!!

cards.name: Life Mage
cards.description: Dark as it may be, letting lifeforce go to waste is depressing to me.

cards.name: Dragon Egg
cards.description: Don't take the bait.

cards.name: Ruby Dragon
cards.description: You took the bait.

cards.name: Shower Mage
cards.description: Hey! I do shower every morning! I just do the stuff none of you ever want to do.

cards.name: Holo Mox
cards.description: It seems fake, but it still channels orange mox.

cards.name: Horse Mage
cards.description: Don't you know I'm a fan-favorite? I carry these mages. Every, single, day!

cards.name: Winged Guardian
cards.description: Go on without me!

cards.name: Swift Sage
cards.description: As in... swift to accept sacrifice.

cards.name: Dark Knight
cards.description: The magic equivalent of an Urayuli...

cards.name: Animox
cards.description: Gotta go thanks

cards.name: Withered Corpse
cards.description: Literal meat shields. What else can you do with 'em?

cards.name: Empty Vessel
cards.description: Empty as its soul, free as its case.

cards.name: Leaping Vessel
cards.description: Hiyah!

cards.name: Energized Vessel
cards.description: Click!

cards.name: Bloody Vessel
cards.description: Ew.

cards.name: Splintered Vessel
cards.description: Hmm!

cards.name: Conductive Vessel
cards.description: BZZZ!

cards.name: Contaminated Vessel
cards.description: Shyly toxic!

cards.name: Geck
cards.description: Ported from Act 1. Act 2 sprite from Kaycee's Mod. It's just a small reptile...

cards.name: Acid Squirrel
cards.description: Its suffering is eternal.

cards.name: Shambling Cairn
cards.description: It makes bones, and what else?

cards.name: Moon Shard
cards.description: Uh oh...?

cards.name: The Moon
cards.description: UH OH!!!

sigils.Airborne: A card bearing this sigil will strike an opponent directly, even if there is a creature opposing it.
sigils.Ant Spawner: When a card bearing this sigil is played, an ant is created in your hand.
sigils.Armored: The first time a card bearing this sigil would take damage, prevent that damage.
sigils.Attack Conduit: Other creatures within a circuit completed by a card bearing this sigil gain 1 power.
sigils.Battery Bearer: When a card bearing this sigil is played, it provides an energy cell to its owner.
sigils.Bees Within: Once a card bearing this sigil is struck, a Bee is created in your hand.
sigils.Bellist: When a card bearing this sigil is played, a Chime is created on each empty adjacent space. A card bearing this sigil will perform a retaliatory attack against any card striking a Chime.
sigils.Bifurcated Strike: A card bearing this sigil will strike each opposing space to the left and right of the space across from it.
sigils.Blood Lust: When a card bearing this Sigil attacks an opposing creature and it perishes, this card gains 1 power.
sigils.Blue Mox: While a card bearing this sigil is on the board, it provides a blue gem to its owner.
sigils.Bomb Spewer: When a card bearing this sigil is played, fill all empty spaces with explode bots.
sigils.Bone Digger: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will generate 1 bone.
sigils.Bone King: When a card bearing this sigil dies, 4 bones are awarded instead of 1.
sigils.Boneless: When a card bearing this sigil dies, no bones are awarded.
sigils.Brittle: After attacking, a card bearing this sigil perishes.
sigils.Burrower: When an empty space would be struck, a card bearing this sigil will move to that space to receive the strike instead.
sigils.Corpse Eater: If a creature that you own perishes by combat, a card bearing this sigil in your hand is automatically played in its place.
sigils.Dam Builder: When a card bearing this sigil is played, a Dam is created on each empty adjacent space.
sigils.Depleting: When a card bearing this sigil is played, 2 energy cells are removed from its owner
sigils.Detonator: When a card bearing this sigil dies, the creature opposing it, as well as adjacent friendly creatures, are dealt 10 damage.
sigils.Detonator (5): When a card bearing this sigil dies, the creature opposing it, as well as adjacent friendly creatures, are dealt 5 damage.
sigils.Disentomb: Pay 1 bone to create a skeleton in your hand.
sigils.Disentomb (Corpses): Pay 2 bones to create a withered corpse in your hand.
sigils.Double Death: When another creature you own dies, it is returned to life and dies again immediately.
sigils.Double Strike: A card bearing this Sigil will strike the opposing space an extra time when attacking.
sigils.Energy Conduit: If a card bearing this sigil is part of a completed circuit, your energy never depletes.
sigils.Energy Conduit (+3): If a card bearing this sigil is part of a completed circuit, your maximum energy increases by 3.
sigils.Energy Gun: Pay 1 energy to deal 1 damage to the creature across from a card bearing this sigil.
sigils.Enlarge: Pay 2 bones to increase the power and health of a card bearing this sigil by 1.
sigils.Enlarge (3): Pay 3 bones to increase the power and health of a card bearing this sigil by 1.
sigils.Fecundity: When a card bearing this sigil is played, a copy of it is created in your hand.
sigils.Fecundity (Kaycee): When a card bearing this sigil is played, a copy of it is created in your hand without this sigil.
sigils.Fledgling: A card bearing this sigil will grow into a more powerful form after 1 turn on the board.
sigils.Frozen Away: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, the creature inside is released in its place.
sigils.Gem Animator: Mox cards on the owner's side of the board gain 1 power.
sigils.Gem Dependant: If a card bearing this sigil's owner controls no mox cards, a card bearing this sigil perishes.
sigils.Gem Detonator (5): When Mox cards on the owner's side of the board die, they Detonate (the creature opposing them, as well as adjacent friendly creatures, are dealt 5 damage).
sigils.Gem Guardian: When a card bearing this sigil is played, all Moxa cards on the owners' side of the board gain Nano Armor.
sigils.Great Mox: While a card bearing this sigil is on the board, it provides a green, orange, and blue gem to its owner.
sigils.Green Mox: While a card bearing this sigil is on the board, it provides a green gem to its owner.
sigils.Guardian: When an opposing creature is placed opposite to an empty space, a card bearing this sigil will move to that empty space.
sigils.Handy: When a card bearing this sigil is played, discard your hand then draw a new hand of 4 cards.
sigils.Hefty: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil. creatures in the way will be pushed in the same direction.
sigils.Hoarder: When a card bearing this sigil is played, you may search your deck for any card and take it into your hand.
sigils.Leader: Creatures adjacent to a card bearing this sigil gain 1 Power.
sigils.Looter: When a card bearing this sigil deals damage directly, draw a card for each damage dealt.
sigils.Made of Stone: A card bearing this sigil is immune to the effects of touch of death and stinky.
sigils.Many Lives: When a card bearing this sigil is sacrificed it does not perish.
sigils.Marrow Sucker: Pay 2 bones to heal a card bearing this sigil.
sigils.Mental Gemnastics: When a card bearing this sigil is played, you draw cards equal to the amount of mox cards on your side of the board.
sigils.Mighty Leap: A card bearing this sigil will block an opposing creature bearing the airborne sigil.
sigils.Music Player: A card bearing this sigil plays a song of your choice when played
sigils.Orange Mox: While a card bearing this sigil is on the board, it provides an orange gem to its owner.
sigils.Omni Strike: A card bearing this sigil will strike all opposing spaces.
sigils.Power Dice: Pay 1 energy to set the power of a card bearing this sigil randomly between 1 and 6.
sigils.Power Dice (2): Pay 2 energy to set the power of a card bearing this sigil randomly between 1 and 6.
sigils.Rabbit Hole: When a card bearing this sigil is played, a Rabbit is created in your hand.
sigils.Reconstitute: A card bearing this sigil returns to your hand 2 turns after it persihes.
sigils.Repulsive: If a creature would attack a card bearing this sigil, it does not.
sigils.Ruby Heart: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, a ruby mox is created in its place.
sigils.Noble Sacrifice: A card bearing this sigil is counted as 2 blood rather than 1 blood when sacrificed.
sigils.Scopophobic: A card bearing this sigil gains 1 power when not facing an enemy creature.
sigils.Sentry: When a creature moves into the space opposing a card bearing this sigil, they are dealt 1 damage.
sigils.Sharp Quills: Once a card bearing this sigil is struck, the striker is then dealt a single damage point.
sigils.Side Hustle: When a card bearing this sigil deals damage directly, draw a card from your side deck for each damage dealt.
sigils.Skeleton Crew: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil and drop a skeleton in its old space.
sigils.Skeleton Crew (Yarr): At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil and drop a pirate skeleton in its old space.
sigils.Spawn Conduit: Empty spaces within a circuit completed by a card bearing this sigil spawn L33pB0ts at the end of the owner's turn.
sigils.Sprinter: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil.
sigils.Squirrel Shedder: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil and drop a squirrel in their old space.
sigils.Stinky: The creature opposing a card bearing this sigil loses 1 Power.
sigils.Stimulate: Pay 3 energy to increase the power and health of a card bearing this sigil by 1.
sigils.Stimulate (4): Pay 4 energy to increase the power and health of a card bearing this sigil by 1.
sigils.Tentacle: Includes effect of Waterborne. In addition, a card bearing this sigil will transform into a random tentacle at the start of each turn.
sigils.Thick: A card bearing this sigil is juicy, and takes up 2 spaces.
sigils.Touch of Death: When a card bearing this sigil damages another creature, that creature perishes.
sigils.Transformer: At the beginning of your turn a card bearing this sigil will transform to, or from, Beast mode.
sigils.Trifurcated Strike: A card bearing this sigil will strike each opposing space to the left, right, and center of it.
sigils.True Scholar: If you have a blue gem, sacrifice a card bearing this sigil to draw 3 cards.
sigils.Unkillable: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, a copy of it is created in your hand.
sigils.Vessel Printer: Once a card bearing this sigil is struck, draw a card from your side deck.
sigils.Waterborne: A card bearing this sigil submerges itself during its opponent's turn. while submerged, opposing creatures attack its owner directly.
sigils.Worthy Sacrifice: A card bearing this sigil is counted as 3 blood rather than 1 blood when sacrificed.
